JourneySection.roadmapTitle: Definition of the roadmap to reach your priority targets
JourneySection.step1Description: We choose relevant KPIs to measure progress, set realistic timelines, and align your sustainability goals with business objectives. Together, we'll build a clear action plan that ensures accountability and drives measurable impact.
JourneySection.step2Description: I help your team execute the strategy through regular check-ins, expert guidance, and adaptive support. We'll monitor progress, troubleshoot challenges, and celebrate milestones to keep momentum strong throughout your sustainability journey.
JourneySection.step2Title: Implementation of the roadmap, with a tailored follow-up

TopicsSection.description: Whatever your own business sector, below topics are, most probably, relevant for you. Given my background, I have advanced expertise in industry, energy and construction sectors. For below listed sectors, there are specific sectoriel workshops, addressing transversal topics. This being said, if you work in other areas, I do have powerful tools that would help you embark your stakeholders and start your sustainability and circularity journey.
TopicsSection.title: Topics & sectors I work on

WhoAmISection.paragraph1: A generalist engineer by training, I managed energy projects for 15 years, working both on site and in the office.
WhoAmISection.paragraph2: I delivered a wide portfolio of assets, including biomass cogeneration plants and wind farms, in large corporate and start-up.
WhoAmISection.paragraph3: Now self-employed, I leverage my transversal skills, result-oriented mindset and enthusiasm to help organisations reduce their environmental impacts with a structured approach.
WhoAmISection.title: Who am I

WhySection.altFigure: Main risks from climate and environmental pressures and related opportunities
WhySection.climate: Climate and environmental challenges present significant risks to organizations across all sectors—ranging from legal and regulatory pressures to financial volatility, operational disruptions, and reputational damage.
WhySection.figcaption: Key risks and opportunities arising from climate and environmental pressures. Click to zoom.
WhySection.however: However, these same challenges also create unprecedented opportunities. Organizations that proactively address sustainability can unlock improved operational efficiency, drive innovation, enhance their market attractiveness, and access new funding sources.
WhySection.why: Why sustainability matters for your organisation
